knimeNode.name: Convert to Table
knimeNode.shortDescription: Takes a generic R port as input and converts it into a data table. This requires the content of the genericR port to be a R data-frame. Other objects than data-frames can not be converted back into a Knime-table.

fullDescription.intro:
Takes a generic R port as input and converts it into a data table.
Make sure that Rserve is running somewhere, and Knime is accordingly configured (Knime->Preferences).
Detailed documentation about the scripting integration:
MPI-CBG SWEG Wiki

ports.inPort: A generic R object which is a data-frame.
ports.outPort: The data-frame converted back into a knime table.
